Pool screen enclosures

Transform your pool into a private oasis with our stylish screen enclosures. Keep your pool area clean and critter-free. Customize your design with various options. Enjoy year-round swimming – contact us today!

Patio screen enclosures

Enhance your patio with our stylish, protective screen enclosures. Bid farewell to pests and enjoy uninterrupted relaxation. Our enclosures keep bugs out while letting in fresh air and light. Customize your design to match your style - from frames to screens.

Free estimate

Request your quote

We use only high-quality materials of domestic production
18 x 14 Fiberglass Mesh Insect Screen
This 18x14 screen is a traditional choice for patio and pool enclosures. Pool & Patio Screen was designed for applications where extra strength is desired.
No-See-Um Screening (20 x 20)
This 20x20 fiberglass screen is a tightly-woven mesh designed to control small insects. No-See-Um Screen still allows good ventilation and visibility, while it provides some daytime privacy and stops most small insects.
Glas-Shield™ is a vinyl-laminated 18x14
Glas-Shield™ is a vinyl-laminated 18x14 fiberglass screen. Glas-Shield can be installed below the chair rail to keep dirt and debris out of pool enclosures or as a privacy screen in vertical (wall) applications. Not made to be used as roofing material or in horizontal applications.
